Light off 1
Light radius 25 #FFFFFF
A
Light on 2
\n<???>Hey, Seb.
\n<???>Can I join you?
Yes
No
Yes
No
LittleLad joined the party.
Light off 2
Light radius 150 #FFFFFF
\n<???>You seem stressed lately.
\n<???>Are you doing okay?
\n<???>I know you don't want to answer me.
\n<???>Do you remember back at school,\. Seb?
\n<???>You'd hang out in the Cup o' Joe cafe.
\n<???>You, Beck, Allen, Evers, Will Dwyer, Max, even Wali and
Amal...
\n<???>Every day,\. before and after school...
\n<???>It was so fun,\. and by the end of the school year,\.
everyone was there.
\n<???>Do you remember CCE?
\n<???>Cold Cafe Etiquette,\. for you and your friend group.\.
What was it called...\. the Dumpster Fire?
\n<???>You'd hang out in the cold cafeteria,\. or in the student
commons,\. after school.
\n<???>It was a simpler time.\. You, Wali, Will Merwin, Juan,
Dan, Adrianna...
\n<???>Your own place to just enjoy being in each other's
company.
\n<???>Or how about genetics class?
\n<???>Do you remember how you and Beck became friends?
\n<???>It was the Skittles lab.\. After that,\. he began to say
hi to you more often.
\n<???>And then...\. well, you know the rest.
\n<???>Your lab table...\. you, Beck, Allen, and Logan.
\n<???>By the end of the class,\. you were all so much closer
than you were before.
You don't want to hear this.\. You don't want to see
this.
You need to save your friends.\. You need to stop
Oliullah.
\n<???>Why did you create this world?
\n<???>Did you want to erase those memories?
\n<???>Or was it something more...?
\n<???>To stop senior year from coming...
\n<???>To stop your friend from going to \c[10]Greece\c[0]...
\n<???>Or to stop time,\. because you believed you wouldn't
have something like this ever again...
\n<???>Or maybe it was something deeper.
\n<???>A \c[10]fear\c[0] that you didn't feel you'd be able to overcome.
\n<???>So you ran away.\. You got help from her.\. You found a
solution.
\n<???>That's the one thing you were always good at doing:\.
problem solving.
You need to get away.\. You don't have to think about
\c[10]Greece\c[0].\. You don't have to leave the past behind.
\n<???>That \c[10]fear\c[0] isn't impossible to defeat, Seb.
\n<???>Keep your head high,\. stay positive,\. and you'll get
past it.
\n<???>Seb...?\. Do you not understand?
\n<???>Your friend didn't know what she was doing, Seb.
\n<???>You think this is a safe world to reside in.\. But over
time,\. this world will envelop the souls of you and all
of your friends.
\n<???>If you refuse to make it out in time...\. if you refuse
to accept and move on...
\n<???>Then there won't be a future to look forward to.
Light on 2
Light radius 25 #FFFFFF
\n<???>It was nice talking to you, Seb.
\n<???>I hope you can make the right choice.
The figure hugs you.\. Hug back?\.
Yes
No
Yes
You hug back.\. It's a warm embrace.\. You remember hugging
your mother,\. your father,\. your sister,\. your friends,\.
your family.\.\. They all care about you.\. And this is how
you repay them?\.\.
No
You don't hug back.\. They still hug you just the same.\.
You remember your friends always hugging you first,\.
even when you wouldn't hug back.\.\. They wanted you to be
happy.\. Can't you let them be happy?\.\.
You want to leave this world.\. You want to go back.
Light off 2
LittleLad left the party.
The fantastical nature of this world doesn't seem to be
enough anymore.
You take another step forward into the darkness.
Your friends would be happier outside of this place.
You take another step forward into the darkness.
There will be many more memories to be grateful for,\.
even without them.
You take another step forward into the darkness.
As long as you keep your head high and stay positive,\.
you'll get through it.
You take another step forward into the darkness.
They're all counting on you.
They're all...\. counting on you...\.
As long as you keep your head high...\. and...\. and...\.\.
You take another step forward\. and feel\. the \c[10]fear\c[0] wrap
around you\. it's slimy tentacles covering your skin\.
choking\. you
You can't go back now.
You will just disappoint yourself this year.
Your friends won't forgive you.
You will be alone like you were before.
If you stay here,\. it'll all be alright.
If you stay here,\. your friends won't remember a thing.
If you stay here,\. there will be plenty of memories.
If you stay here...
You want to stay here.\. You don't want to leave this
world.
You want\. to stay\.\. here.
Light deactivate
The \c[10]fear\c[0] disappears into the wind.\. You're free.
You won't leave this world.

Yes

\n<???>That \c[10]fear\c[0] isn't impossible to defeat, Seb.
\n<???>Keep your head high,\. stay positive,\. and you'll get
past it.
\n<???>Seb...?\. Do you not understand?
\n<???>Your friend didn't know what she was doing, Seb.
\n<???>You think this is a safe world to reside in.\. But over
time,\. this world will envelop the souls of you and all
of your friends.
\n<???>If you refuse to make it out in time...\. if you refuse
to accept and move on...
\n<???>Then there won't be a future to look forward to.
Light on 2
Light radius 25 #FFFFFF
\n<???>It was nice talking to you, Seb.
\n<???>I hope you can make the right choice.
The figure hugs you.\. Hug back?\.
Yes
No
Yes
You hug back.\. It's a warm embrace.\. You remember hugging
your mother,\. your father,\. your sister,\. your friends,\.
your family.\.\. They all care about you.\. And this is how
you repay them?\.\.
No
You don't hug back.\. They still hug you just the same.\.
You remember your friends always hugging you first,\.
even when you wouldn't hug back.\.\. They wanted you to be
happy.\. Can't you let them be happy?\.\.
You want to leave this world.\. You want to go back.
